comments.body: This comment was modified in the original commit.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +17,21 @@ * A trait providing an optional cache for classpath entries obtained from zip and jar files.
 * It allows us to e.g. reduce significantly memory used by PresentationCompilers in Scala IDE
 * when there are a lot of projects having a lot of common dependencies.
 */
sealed trait ZipAndJarFileLookupFactory {
